title: Tic Tac
items: Launched "Tic Tac! The Classic Predecessor to Tic Tac Toe!"

title: Grades Shortcut
items: Added Shortcut to get summary of grades
Added Contact Information

title: Grades on Seperate Server
items: Moved Grade Checker to Digital Ocean Droplet at [https://grades.katzrkool.xyz](https://grades.katzrkool.xyz)

title: Fixed Menu Checker Bugs & Grade Checker Privacy
items: Fixed bug where some elements wouldn't move properly if user was trying to access the previous week
Fixed bug where if menu information wasn't available, the site would crash
Updated Privacy Policy for Grade Checker to be more thorough

title: Added Data Point about Missing Assignments
items: Added Data Point that states the user's grade if the missing assignments were not counted against them

title: Made Adjustments and Fixes to Grade Checker
items: An 89.5 and above is an A, a 79.5 and up is a B, etc
The "How many points can you afford to lose" didn't take missing grades into account, now it does
Changed the color for a B to a less harsh color

title: Grade Checker Changes and FAQ
items: The default score ignores missing assignments, to mimic myBackpack
Changed the "grade without missing" stat to "grade with missing" stat.
Added an [FAQ!](https://grades.katzrkool.xyz/faq)
Made the JS prettier :)

title: Spooky Halloween Redesign
items: Website Redesigned!
Gave Shortcuts its own section
Put a nifty disclaimer on the grade site about the dangers of weighted grades
Grade checker presents the grade mybackpack presents

title: Removed Feature because of the myBackpack
items: Since we're using the myBackpack grade for the total now, the "if we counted missing assignments, you would have an F" feature isn't relevant.

title: Menu & Grades updates
items: Menu now uses an sqlite3 database instead of a JSON file. Performance is up
As a side effect of the database change, the menu now won't delete old data, historical data will be available from December 2018. Possibly extending later

Grade Checker now has a nifty analytic that reads something like "You've earned 154.0 points out of 175.0 points. 154.0 / 175.0 = 0.88" for every subject. It should help anyone wanting to do manual calculations.
The Grade Checker api endpoint is now at /api
Menu now says how many times chicken has been served on days that serve chicken.

title: Kahoot & new domain
items: Made a Kahoot keyboard shortcut extension for Firefox. Available on the [Mozilla Addons Store](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/kahoot-keyboard-shortcuts/)
Changed domain name from katzrkool.xyz to lkellar.org . All services have been moved and all katzrkool.xyz links will redirect until July (when the domain expires).
Email address on the main page has changed from admin@katzrkool.xyz to [lucas@lkellar.org](mailto:lucas@lkellar.org)
Menu & Grade shortcuts have been updated to support new domain. More information available at the shortcuts page.
Fixed bug where menu was slow for the first user every day.

title: 2019 Rollover Update
items: Moved grades.lkellar.org to new server.
Grades will tell you when your password is incorrect, instead of the blank gray screen of nothingness.
Grades analytics have been temporary removed, because I have to test them with semester 2 data, but they'll be back next Monday (2018-01-14)
Grades api has changed a bit, see [Github](https://github.com/katzrkool/backpack) for more info
Made updates to Menu to ensure the data are updated on time

title: Grades Semester 2 Update
items: Assignments from different semesters are separated by a line
Analytics are only calculated for second semester (because I was told semester 1 and 2 were separate)
Added a Expand/Collapse button
Grades now optimized for mobile view
[Grades Test page](https://grades.lkellar.org/test) updated for semester 2

title: Added myBackpack Error Page
items: Grades now detects when myBackpack breaks, and informs the user appropriately

title: Added date param to menu
items: The Menu api now has a date parameter that replaces the old days param. Clients can pass either a date in the yyyy-mm-dd format or a number of days to skip ahead. See the [api documentation on Github](https://github.com/katzrkool/menu#api) for more info

title: Made Grades Better
items: If a teacher put in one assignment, worth zero points, grades would crash because it would try to get the average, but it would divide by zero and crash. That was fixed
If it breaks, myBackpack breaks, or you break it, you'll be better informed on what happened

title: Added Dark mode
items: Added dark mode to the main site, menu, and grade checker
To activate, tap the "activate dark mode" button on the main page
Once activated, your preference is remembered with a cookie, so you don't have to switch it manually all the time
If your browser and operating system supports dark mode for websites via the "prefers-color-scheme" media query (currently macOS Mojave with Safari Technology Preview), it'll auto switch

title: Dark Mode Update
items: Dark mode now uses local storage instead of cookies to save bandwidth and because local storage is cooler

title: Jinja Template Transition
items: Migrated Grade Checker and Menu over to Jinja for page generation
Fixed a couple bugs related to error pages not displaying correctly and typos

title: Legacy Domain Banner
items: Added a banner to alert users entering through katzrkool.xyz of its deprecation

title: Updated Dark Mode
items: Updated dark mode on all services to now prioritize your preference of theme via the button on the site, higher than your system colors. This should have not much impact, but if you have set a preference (hit the dark mode button), the site will not react to your system preference.

title: Fixed Menu Date Bug
items: Fixed a bug where if the api was hit, or the [Menu Shortcut](https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/f5cb5dffd7264c97973363462ac2d279) was run after 12:00, it wouldn't give the next day's menu

title: The Great Viewport Revolution
items: Learned about the Viewport Meta tag, which improves the mobile mode for services that use it.
Menu now uses Viewport Meta Tag
Grades now uses Viewport Meta Tag
Some parts of the main site use Viewport Meta Tag, I'm leaving the home page the way it is, because adding the tag doesn't use space efficiently

title: Shutdown Grade Checker
items: Grade Checker has been shut down, see [this page](https://lkellar.org/grades) for more info.

title: Home Bar and Mobile Optimizations
items: Added a home bar to all sub pages applicable
Made Tic Tac optimized for mobile
Home page is now a single column view on mobile
Removed the Shortcuts section

title: Shelf and Dark Mode Improvements
items: [New Service: Shelf!](https://lkellar.org/shelf) A place to temporarily store text without creating digital clutter.
Dark mode now uses just media queries instead of the weird custom JS file I was using.

title: License and Dark Mode Changes
items: Update dark mode on home page
the whole site is now MIT licensed

title: Legacy Domain Banner
items: [New Service: Stocks!](https://lkellar.org/stocks) A visualizer for the Stock Market Game. Used to be private, now public!

title: Menu Relaunch
items: The New School Menu is back up with Sage Dining Support
There's also a new Shortcut to get menu data! [Download Here](https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/33b878254f1042e0808dcd4d114b759b) (Requires iOS 13 or higher)

title: Bug Fixes and Enhancements
items: Added dark mode to menu
Fixed bug where "&amp" would appear in menu shortcut
Now updating top/worst performer in stocks upon stock update
Fixed bug with inaccurate fee calculation in stocks

title: Added Crime Map
items: [Julian Sanker](https://puffyboa.xyz/) and I made Crime Map, a tool to see recent 911 calls from Fayetteville, for the [2019 JB Hunt Hackathon](https://hackathon.jbhunt.com/home)

title: Menu Time Travel
items: Added ability to get weeks in the future or past on menu
Similar functionality is now also available for the api, see docs

title: Shutdown Stock Market Game Dashboard
items: Shutdown the Stock Market Game Dashboard

title: Added Springdale to Crime Map!
items: Added Springdale calls from [their website](http://www.springdalear.gov/413/Dispatch-Logs). Still in beta though, so the icons won't be perfect yet (you'll see a lot of yellow triangles), and a few calls that are [10s or 100s of miles away from Springdale](https://github.com/katzrkool/maps/issues/13)

title: Added SOI Scheduler
items: Added [SOI Scheduler](https://lkellar.org/soischeduler) shortcut, a way to quickly add events to your calendar that happen during classes, like an exam.
Also changed crime map description to include Springdale as well

title: Website Refresh
items: Redid the website! Now it has more pictures and looks a bit brighter
Added an about page. It's pretty cool

title: Added Micro.blog and Changelog Feed
items: Created a Micro.blog at [https://micro.lkellar.org](https://micro.lkellar.org) for posting cat pictures and short thoughts
Added a JSON Feed for this changelog, available at [https://lkellar.org/changelog/feed.json](https://lkellar.org/changelog/feed.json)

title: Changed Crime Map URL
items: Changed Crime Map URL to [crimemap.app](https://crimemap.app), hosted by [Julian Sanker](https://puffyboa.xyz)

title: Removed Micro.blog
items: Removed micro.blog and replaced it with changelog in the menu bar
